content: Diptarka ChakrabortySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationAssistant ProfessorSchool of Computing,National University of SingaporeEmail: <firstname> at comp dot nus dot edu dot sg Research InterestsPublicationsOpen PositionsContact AddressTeachingStudents and PostdocsSelected TalksResearch InterestsTheoretical computer science; more specifically, algorithms on large data sets, sublinear algorithms, approximation algorithms, graph algorithms, and data structures.Brief Bio: I did my PhD from Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur under the supervision of Prof. Manindra Agrawal and Prof. Satyadev Nandakumar. After that I spent two years at Charles University, Prague, Czech Republic as a post-doctoral fellow hosted by Prof. Michal Koucky, and then almost a year at Weizmann Institute of Science, Israel as a post-doctoral fellow hosted by Prof. Robert Krauthgamer.PublicationsGeneralizing Fair Clustering to Multiple Groups: Algorithms and Applications with Kushagra Chatterjee, Debarati Das, and Tien Long NguyenAAAI 2026 (selected for oral presentation)Towards Fair Representation: Clustering and Consensus with Kushagra Chatterjee, Debarati Das, Tien Long Nguyen, and Romina NobahariCOLT 2025Improved Rank Aggregation under Fairness Constraint with Yan Hong Yao Alvin, Himika Das, and Sanjana DeyIJCAI 2025Equivalence Testing: The Power of Bounded Adaptivitywith Sourav Chakraborty, Gunjan Kumar, and Kuldeep S.
